(switch ; Only one dream choice mission allowed (msnFind "* +huariDreamChoice;") (msnDestroy gSource)
; Player must have completed the dream test (not (msnFind "r +unid:&msHuaramarcaDreamTest;")) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Set up the mission (block Nil
; No intro for this mission (msnSetProperty gSource 'isIntroShown True) ) )
Events.OnAccepted:
(block ( (baseObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (gateObj (sysFindObject baseObj "GN -uncharted;"))
; Get list of all Huari fortresses (huariTargets (sysFindObject baseObj "AT N:350; +huari; +populated; -huariTemple;"))
; Find a point between here and the stargate (startPos (sysVectorPolarOffset baseObj (sysVectorAngle (sysVectorSubtract (objGetPos gateObj) (objGetPos baseObj))) 1000 )) enemyObj ) ; One to two ships attack each habitat (enum huariTargets theTarget (for i 1 (random 1 2) (block Nil (setq enemyObj (sysCreateShip &scCarrierEarthSlaver; startPos &svSung;)) ; Reduce the number of wind slavers (objSetData enemyObj 'totalCount (random 5 8)) ; Point the player at this ship (objSetShowAsDestination enemyObj) ; Attack the bases (setq aTargetObj theTarget) (objFireEvent enemyObj 'OrderBombardTarget)
; Register for events (msnRegisterForEvents gSource enemyObj) (msnIncData gSource 'enemyTargets) (objSetData enemyObj 'huariDefend (objGetID gSource)) ) ) )
; Send more ships to attack temple (for i 1 4 (block Nil (setq enemyObj (sysCreateShip &scCarrierEarthSlaver; startPos &svSung;)) (objSetShowAsDestination enemyObj) (setq aTargetObj baseObj) (objFireEvent enemyObj 'OrderBombardTarget)
; Register for events (msnRegisterForEvents gSource enemyObj) (msnIncData gSource 'enemyTargets) (objSetData enemyObj 'huariDefend (objGetID gSource)) ) )
; Send Dragon Slaver after the player (setq enemyObj (sysCreateShip &scDragonSlaver; gateObj &svSung;)) (shpOrder enemyObj 'waitForThreat Nil 10) (shpOrder enemyObj 'attack gPlayerShip) (shpOrder enemyObj 'attack baseObj)
; Register for events (msnRegisterForEvents gSource enemyObj) (msnIncData gSource 'enemyTargets) (objSetData enemyObj 'huariDefend (objGetID gSource))
; Create a flock of Wind slavers to fight the Hurins at the gate (for i 1 30 (block Nil (setq enemyObj (sysCreateShip &scWindSlaver; gateObj &svSung;)) (shpOrder enemyObj 'attackNearestEnemy) ) ) (msnSetData gSource 'destID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))
; Ignore friendly fire (objSetProperty baseObj 'ignoreFriendlyFire True) )

Language.Text: The Sung are attacking the Huari Temple in Huaramarca. Your mission is to defend it at all costs.

"As I said, the Sung have found us, and they have massed a fleet for an assault on this system. You know that from your dream. Stay and help us! I don't know what role the Light has planned for you, but I'm sure it doesn't include letting us be exterminated!"
"Good luck to you and to us all. May the blessings of the Light fill our worlds again."

Apotamo is inside the temple. One of his assistants talks to you. There is a hint of panic in his voice:
"Whether you are the Solti or not, please do what you can to help us!"

"we're not safe yet! Whether you are the Solti or not, please do what you can to help us!"

Apotamo is inside the temple. One of his assistants talks to you:
"The Light has delivered us! But there are still a few enemies left. Do what you can to end their suffering."

You find Apotamo's broken body among the ruins of the temple. He struggles to whisper in your ear:
"I was wrong. Only darkness awaits."

Apotamo greets you as you enter.
"Thank you! You have given us new hope! Despite their great technology, the Sung are not invincible. I wish you could stay with us and help us to defeat them, but I know your path lies among the stars."
